page.title: 18INDUSTRY
page.content: Industry As this is an agricultural area there is very little industry in the block.There is one shop in Holton village which is a Post Office and General Store.Most customers come from the village but they also get some passing trade. As well as the shop a fish man and a butcher visit the village once a week and a library van comes once a fortnight. In the late 1970's the Oak side cattery was founded by Mr. and Mrs.Horton.It is situated behind the Hope Tavern and is open 24 hours and 12 months a year.
